intent_atoms.description: Decoder must return Result values so tolerant parsing can record malformed header diagnostics.
Track manual VoiceOver verification on macOS and iPadOS hardware to confirm the focus command menu announces controls and restores focus targets as expected.
Real-World Assets task is blocked until external licensing approvals are obtained for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4 and MPEG-H fixtures.
Refresh snapshots and CLI fixtures whenever schema updates are intentional via ISOINSPECTION_REGENERATE_SNAPSHOTS=1 swift test --filter JSONExportSnapshotTests.

functional_units.name: BoxHeaderDecoder Result Refactor
functional_units.description: Refactors the BoxHeaderDecoder to return Result values for tolerant parsing and diagnostic recording

functional_units.name: VoiceOver Regression Pass for Accessibility Shortcuts
functional_units.description: Tracks manual VoiceOver verification on macOS/iPadOS hardware to confirm focus command menu announcements and focus restoration

functional_units.name: Real-World Assets Licensing
functional_units.description: Secures Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, MPEG-H fixtures for regression baselines after licensing approvals

functional_units.name: Snapshot & CLI Fixture Maintenance
functional_units.description: Refreshes snapshots and CLI fixtures when schema updates occur using ISOINSPECTOR_REGENERATE_SNAPSHOTS environment variable
